reviewText: I used to have a coloring book of this when I was little now I have the DVD  thank you
Perfect gift! Came in great condition and was as described.
great movie; my child loves it!
My grandchildren have watched this a thousand times!!!  It is short and very sweet.  I highly recommend it for very small children!!!
Love this story!!! Grandkids have enjoyed it so much that purchased 2 more as gifts. It's a sweet story of kindnessand  friendship.
My grandson loves this CD. I love it because it teaches that color does not matter, including those that are different to be included, in a way that would influence a child.
I got this as one of three for my granddaughters since so much of what is on TV today is unfit for small children. They absolutely LOVE all three of these movies.

This is a fun story especially to be shared with children.
(We had seen it before, but wanted our own copy.)
I can't believe we found it on DVD.  Always a VHS favorite when my children were little, now we can enjoy it again.  It came quickly and in excellent condition.  Thank you.
